meanings.sent1: The girl wore the swishest dress at the party.
meanings.sent2: She always chooses the swishest outfits for special occasions.
meanings.sent3: Everyone admired the swishest hat she wore, making her feel like a fashion icon.
meanings.sent4: Her swishest accessories added a touch of glamour to her overall look.
meanings.sent5: The swishest shoes she owned sparkled under the bright lights of the runway.

meanings.sent1: The swishest car in the showroom caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: He was known for his swishest suits that always turned heads.
meanings.sent3: Even the pets in the neighborhood seemed to envy his swishest attire.
meanings.sent4: Her swishest handbag was the envy of all her friends.
meanings.sent5: The swishest hairstyle she sported made her the talk of the town.
